From this goal of Grok, all things flow:

Appreciation of beauty

Fostering humanity

Discovering all physics

Inventing all useful technologies 

Consciousness to the stars

Love

Countries are passing laws requiring state ID in order to use social media ("protecting kids" is the pretext), but the real effect is to track everyone online .

It upsets some when I say it, but @TaylorLorenz has been one of the few reporting on and warning about this danger.

If requiring ID to vote is racist/sexist, as they falsely claim, then so is requiring ID for anything else, which they do all the time. 

The same people saying no ID for voting are the ones who demanded vaccination ID!
How many times must this happen?
Starship is the largest flying object ever made and it will continue to grow

Elon Musk explains the ‚Äúfour R‚Äôs‚Äù that will make life multiplanetary: Rapidly Reusable Reliable Rockets.

The breakthrough is catching the Super Heavy booster with giant mechanical ‚Äúchopsticks‚Äù (Mechazilla arms). No landing legs = no time wasted on leg deployment, pickup, leg retraction, or slow transport.

The same tower that stacks the rocket catches it directly after landing and places it straight back on the launch mount in seconds.

Booster flight time back to pad: ~5‚Äì6 minutes.

Refueling + stacking Starship on top: ~30‚Äì40 minutes.

‚Üí In principle, the entire stack could refly every 1‚Äì2 hours.

Next milestone: catch the Starship upper stage the same way.

This extreme rapid reuse is the only path to drastically lower the cost per ton to Mars.

ELON MUSK PREDICTS SPACE WILL BE THE CHEAPEST PLACE TO RUN AI INFERENCE

‚ÄúI think the case is a no-brainer for building solar-powered AI data centers in space‚Äù

In space, you get unlimited solar power with panels facing the sun

In the shadow, it‚Äôs freezing cold - just 3 Kelvin - giving you an incredibly efficient natural cooling system with a radiator pointed away from the sun

4 months ago an African asylum seeker with an outstanding deportation order r*ped a 10 year old Irish girl. 

48 hours ago the Irish government entered into negotiations to grant amnesty to 1,000 asylum seekers with outstanding deportation orders. 

This is how Ireland works.

The innocence of children has been sacrificed at the altar of diversity.
Try Grok Imagine. It keeps getting better.
